message: Being a light in the dark when i was struggling the most.

message: Being there for me, when i was low or high.

message: Jumping into chaos, after over 10 years of friendship.

message: Beubg a pleasure to work with, and keeping the community safe.

message: Love you man. Thanks.

message: A pillar of support, for the community and me.

message: Thank you for looking after my sister, even when I couldnt.

message: Being that annoying little brother to everyone, known by all.

message: Giving me a laugh throughout my travels.

message: Listening to me yap for over an hour... Dont know why you did that.

message: Trusting me, and allowing me to help someone grow.

message: Making me realise what people really cared aboout me for.

message: Sticking around from the beginning.
